textBox.richText: My first ever journal cover image!

Finally, I got one of my scientific images onto the cover of a journal. See the pdf linked here for the full image from http://www3.interscience.wiley.com/journal/34201/home It’s an autofluorescence image of an adult fruit fly taken with a selective plane illumination microscope (SPIM), a Zeiss prototype machine following on from the work of the Ernst H. K. Stelzer group. Now we have Jan Huisken in the lab, there will be even more SPIM going on....
